naslov: Luksuzna vila s unutarnjim bazenom i pogledom na more – Podstrana (prodaja)
opis: Luksuzna vila s unutarnjim bazenom i pogledom na more – Podstrana Jedinstvena prilika! Na prodaju luksuzna vila smještena u mirnoj i privatnoj mikrolokaciji u Podstrani – savršen spoj elegancije, udobnosti i mediteranskog šarma. Osnovne informacije: Parcela: 800 m² Bruto površina: 512 m² Neto stambena površina: 380 m² Katnost: prizemlje + 1. kat + 2. kat Dvije odvojene stambene jedinice – potpuna privatnost Četiri vanjska i jedno garažno parkirno mjesto Pogled na more s obje terase Udaljenost od mora: 500 m Unutarnji sadržaji: Grijani unutarnji bazen (40 m²) – mogućnost korištenja tijekom cijele godine Klima uređaji u svakoj sobi Podno grijanje u cijeloj kući Centralno grijanje s radijatorima Kalijeva peć i kamin u obje stambene jedinice Aluminijska stolarija s izo staklima i roletama Armiranobetonske međukatne ploče Podovi: parket i kvalitetna keramika Raspored po etažama: Prizemlje – 120 m² Garaža (30 m²), veranda, drvarnica, konoba, WC, sauna, studio apartman, grijani bazen, kupaonica, trijem, unutarnje stubište. Prvi kat – 140 m² Dnevni boravak, blagovaonica i kuhinja (60 m²), radna soba, velika spavaća soba s kupaonicom, studio apartman, praonica, WC, lođa i terasa s pogledom na more. Drugi kat – 120 m² Tri spavaće sobe, terasa s otvorenim pogledom, dnevni boravak, kuhinja i blagovaonica (50 m²), kupaonica i WC. Vanjski prostor: Uređena okućnica s mediteranskim biljem i voćkama Prednji dio: ukrasni vrt-park s crnogoričnim drvećem Stražnji dio: prostor za odmor, rekreaciju, voćnjak i povrtnjak Otvoren pogled na more s obje terase Dodatne prednosti: Vrhunski građena nekretnina – korišteni samo najkvalitetniji materijali Idealna za obiteljski život, ali i kao investicija za turistički najam Potpuna privatnost – dvije potpuno neovisne jedinice Mogućnost cjelogodišnjeg korištenja – grijani bazen, podno i centralno grijanje Pružamo cjelokupnu uslugu – od pregleda nekretnine, izrade predugovora i kupoprodajnog ugovora, primopredaje ključeva do prijenosa vlasništva i komunalija. Cijeli proces nadziru odvjetnik, sudski prevoditelj i javni bilježnik – garantiramo 100% sigurnu transakciju. Kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju. Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani ugovor o posredovanju, u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonom o posredovanju u prometu nekretninama. Kontakt: Davor Tokić +385994035193 info@merit-property.hr www.merit-property.hr ________________________________________ Luxury Villa with Indoor Pool and Sea View – Podstrana A unique opportunity! For sale is a luxury villa located in a quiet and private micro-location in Podstrana – the perfect blend of elegance, comfort, and Mediterranean charm. Key Information: Plot size: 800 m² Gross area: 512 m² Net living area: 380 m² Layout: Ground floor + First floor + Second floor Two separate residential units – complete privacy Four outdoor and one garage parking space Sea view from both terraces Distance from the sea: 500 m Interior Features: Heated indoor pool (40 m²) – usable all year round Air conditioning in every room Underfloor heating throughout the house Central heating with radiators Ceramic wood-burning stove and fireplace in both units Aluminum joinery with insulated glass and shutters Reinforced concrete floor slabs between levels Flooring: parquet and high-quality ceramic tiles Room Layout by Floor: Ground floor – 120 m² Garage (30 m²), veranda, wood storage, cellar, WC, sauna, studio apartment, heated pool, bathroom, covered terrace, indoor staircase. First floor – 140 m² Living room, dining room, and kitchen (60 m²), study, large bedroom with en-suite bathroom, studio apartment, laundry room, WC, loggia, and south-facing terrace with sea view. Second floor – 120 m² Three bedrooms, south-facing terrace with open sea view, living room, kitchen and dining area (50 m²), bathroom, and WC. Outdoor Area: Landscaped garden with Mediterranean plants and fruit trees Front garden: decorative park-style garden with conifers Rear garden: peaceful area for relaxation, recreation, fruit and vegetable growing Open sea view from both terraces Additional Advantages: High-quality construction – only premium materials used Ideal as a family home or an investment for tourist rental Full privacy – two completely independent residential units Year-round comfort – heated pool, underfloor and central heating We provide a complete service – from property viewing, drafting of pre-contract and sales agreement, key handover, to the transfer of ownership and utilities. The entire process is overseen by a lawyer, certified court translator, and public notary – ensuring a 100% safe transaction. Buyer pays agency commission. Property viewings are possible only with a signed brokerage agreement, in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act.
